name: @nimblebraininc/calendly
description: MCP server for Calendly scheduling — event types, scheduled events, invitees, availability, and cancellations.
long_description:
Connect Claude to your Calendly account. Browse event types, view and filter scheduled meetings, inspect invitee details, check availability windows, and cancel events — all without leaving your AI workflow.

## Features

- **Event Types** — list all your Calendly event types with duration and scheduling URL
- **Scheduled Events** — query upcoming or past meetings with status, date, and location filters
- **Invitees** — retrieve attendee details for any scheduled event
- **Availability** — check open time slots for a given event type and date range
- **Cancellation** — cancel events programmatically with an optional reason

## Requirements

A Calendly Personal Access Token from [Calendly Integrations](https://calendly.com/integrations/api_webhooks).
